this_link_has_already_been_posted: Sorry, this link has already been posted, try sharing a new post.
sorry_we_couldnt_find_any_posts: Sorry, no posts in this location, be the first one to share something!
thanks_your_post_is_awaiting_approval: Thank you, your post is pending approval. StoryFeed approves all posts except spam. Usually approval takes a matter of minutes, you will be notified by email.
please_help_me_with_a_vote: Please help me with a vote
share_with_friends_so_help_you_vote: Share your post with your friends so they can help you vote!
remember_to_categorize_your_story_in_the: Categorize your post in the most specific and correct way possible,
country_city_source_and_topic_of_the_sto: the location and the topic of the story.
stories_correctly_categorized_get_more_u: Posts correctly categorized get more upvotes. Good Luck!
this_is_a_community_of_people_who_love_t: Here you can share and vote for the most important stories of your city.
have_a_great_story_share_it_with_the_ent: Have a great story? Share it with your entire city and the world!
the_most_voted_of_the_day: Receive the Most Voted Stories to your Email, Everyday.
